setting: The year is 2421. Humanity has expanded beyond the Sol system, colonizing planets under the Terran Defense Accord (TDA). A fragile peace exists between Earth and its outer colonies, with corporate-backed paramilitary groups vying for control of resource-rich exoplanets. However, the balance shatters when an unknown alien force, later called the Zeirith, launches an invasion at the edge of human-occupied space.
description: Lieutenant Anaya Solis, a gifted quantum-field engineer, is stationed at Dartmouth Station when an alien invasion changes everything. Captured and taken aboard a massive Zeirith dreadnought, she and a handful of survivors are transported through an interdimensional gateway known as the Veil Rift. On the other side lies Zyxara-Prime, a Dyson sphere where the Zeirith reveal the true enemy—The Hollow, a cosmic force devouring entire star systems. Forced to choose between her past and a future among the Zeirith, Anaya must decide whether to fight for humanity’s return or embrace her new destiny as one of the Voidborn.
